item.title: Blair add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Blair add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Blair add a quote by Winston Churchhill
item.description: "We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchhill

item.title: Blair add a quote by Sarah Wendell
item.description: "Being in the habit of saying "Thank you," of making sure that people receive attention so they know you value them, of not presuming that people will always be there--this is a good habit, regardless...make sure to give virtual and actual high-fives to those who rock and rock hard." -- Sarah Wendell

item.title: Blair add a quote by Kahill Gibran
item.description: "You pray in your distress and in your need; would that you might pray also in the fullness of your joy and in your days of abundance." -- Kahill Gibran

item.title: Blair add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Blair add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If the person you are talking to doesn't appear to be listening, be patient. It may simply be that he has a small piece of fluff in his ear." -- A.A. Milne
